slides.text_to_tts: Вы когда-нибудь видели, чтобы бетонный пол ТАК себя вел? Это не просто нефть.
slides.z_image_prompt: cinematic photograph of an old, rusted metal bucket, centered, sitting on a cracked concrete floor in a dimly lit, abandoned Soviet-era factory. The bucket is partially filled with an unnaturally thick, dark, viscous liquid that reflects no light. The background is a blurred expanse of decaying industrial machinery. Clear separation between subject and background. Superimposed at the TOP of the image in a bold, glitched font: 'ЧТО ЗДЕСЬ ПРОИСХОДИТ?' -- moody, atmospheric, dark, post-soviet, analog horror, cinematic

slides.text_to_tts: На старом заводе, где десятилетиями стояла тишина, пол начал 'потеть'. Сначала казалось, обычные подтеки.
slides.z_image_prompt: dramatic close-up shot of a single, old, worn work boot, centered, standing on a cracked concrete floor. A small, dark, oily puddle is slowly seeping from a crack directly beneath the boot. The boot is the clear focal point, well-defined against a softly blurred background of industrial rubble. -- post-soviet, analog horror, gritty, atmospheric, cinematic

slides.text_to_tts: Но эта 'нефть' оказалась чем-то гораздо хуже. Она не пахнет, не горит, и кажется... живой.
slides.z_image_prompt: overhead shot of a spreading, ink-black, viscous liquid anomaly on a grey concrete floor, centered. The liquid forms an organic, vein-like pattern, slowly growing. The concrete floor is the background, distinct from the dark liquid. -- abstract, analog horror, unsettling, dark, textured, high contrast

slides.text_to_tts: Это сгущенная тень. Тень, которая вытекает из самой земли, проникая в пустоты и заполняя их ужасом.
slides.z_image_prompt: cinematic shot of a lone, old, flickering fluorescent light tube, centered, hanging precariously from wires in a dark factory setting. Beneath it, a puddle of the black, oily substance unnaturally reflects warped and elongated shadows, not of the light itself, but of unseen figures. The light tube is the primary object, clearly separated from the dark, industrial background. -- analog horror, eerie, surreal, distorted shadows, post-soviet, unsettling

slides.text_to_tts: Что, если эта тень не просто лежит на полу? Что, если она ищет что-то... или кого-то?
slides.z_image_prompt: dramatic wide shot of a vast, abandoned factory hall, centered, completely consumed by a thick, oppressive black sludge covering the entire floor. A single, ominous, distorted silhouette of a figure is partially visible within the depths of the sludge, reaching out. The sludge and silhouette are the main focus, clearly defined against the decaying, dark industrial architecture of the factory in the background. -- analog horror, existential dread, overwhelming, dark, post-soviet, cinematic, terrifying
